snippet.title: Detective Dotson Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2450840/Detective_Dotson/
Dotson wants to be a Bollywood star!
If he could just land the perfect role
Meanwhile he must keep his day job as a fumbling detective

Join us on a high stakes adventure set in modern day India
Our first episode will launch in Fall 2023 but if you don't want to wait that long, head over to www.dotson.in and start exploring now!

We are Indian storytellers representing modern India to the global audience
Detective Dotson is our love letter to India

Who is Detective Dotson: https://youtu.be/IKNGCWt462M
